posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

   Late last year I started to slim down my collection to have a bit more focus.  Am continuing that mission and have the last few C46s to get rid off.  Scans can be seen at [url]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/C46/[/url] and prices include shipping.  I would also consider trades for different backed T206 Joe Kelley cards [of which I currently have none!].

PM me, post in this thread or email me at [url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url].

Regards,

Richard.

[lot all sold]

All, a big Canadian shout oout ;) to Richard Armstrong for great service!
C46 cards all arrived safely today and all look even better than scans...yep i guess i will try for the set, but in the meantime I'm going to just enjoy this fine transaction from a good collector/dealer dude!!

Thanks for the kind words, Brian, and thanks for making the transaction equally smooth from your side.

Enjoy the cards!

Regards,

Richard the collector ;)
